author: Hans Nichols, Sam Baker
title: Biden will nominate Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court
description: She'd be the first Black female justice in the court’s history.
content:
President Biden plans to name Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the U.S. Supreme Court, according to a source familiar with the matter. 
Why it matters: Jackson would be the first Black female justice … [+1564 chars]
